Reviews.Title: Vivitar vivicam 9112
Reviews.Author: Anne Lesser
Reviews.Content: No instruction manual. Looked simple. Drove to the beach to take pics. Then discovered I can take only 1 test photo without a memory card. Memory card does not come with it & costs about $12. No mention of memory card on the box. Camera is not as good a deal as it looks. Other than that it is light weight. Fits in a pocket. Haven't used it yet.

Reviews.Title: info
Reviews.Author: Susan McTeir
Reviews.Content: was very disappointed that it dd not come with a instruction manual, you must go online and either read it or print it out (67 pages) it has a lot of features, therefore I had to print the manual. very frustrating

ProductInfo.Features:
Anti-Shake Technology
4X Zoom
Shoots Video Clips
ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar 9112SL ViviCam 9 MP Digital Camera with 1.8-Inch LCD Body (Purple)
